title: Udemy - Cryptography and Encryption â€“ Made Easy!
description:
Description
This course covers everything you’ve ever wanted to know about Cryptography AND Encryption… in a easy to understand manner. We’ll review the following concepts:
    Understanding Encryption
    Symmetric vs. Asymmetric Cryptography
    Goals of Cryptography
    Codes vs. Ciphers
    Key Lifecycle Management
    Data Encryption Standard (DES)
    Triple DES (3DES)
    Advanced Encryption Standard (AES)
    Blowfish
    Twofish
    RC4
    RSA Cryptography
    Elliptic Curve & Quantum Cryptography
    Key Exchange
    Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange
    Key Escrow
    Trust Models
    PKI and Digital Certificates
    Hash Functions and Digital Certificates
    Digital Signatures
Who is the target audience?
    This course is for anyone interested in Cryptography and Encryption. We will cover everything from the ground up, in a clear, and eaasy to understand manner.
    This course is for all levels (beginner, mid-level, and advanced)
Requirements
    Everything is taught. No previous experience or knowledge is required. Learn it all in this course!

parsed.dn: Udemy - Cryptography and Encryption – Made Easy!
parsed.name: Udemy - Cryptography and Encryption – Made Easy!
